name: HICC PET Dog Paw Balm 0.21 oz Travel Pack for Dogs & Cats, All-Natural Paw Balm Dogs Lick Safe, Moisturizing and Healing Dry Cracked Paws, Improves Rough Paws Relieves Odor, Horse Hoof, Joint Care
short_description: Nature's Healing Power, Not Just a Wax Seal - Unlike traditional wax-based balms that only offer basic moisture and a physical barrier, our paw care is crafted from natural powerhouses like Sunflower Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa Root Oil, Fermented Coconut Oil, and Sea Buckthorn Oil. This advanced formula elevates paw care from simple moisturizing to active repair and defense. With powerful anti-inflammatory and restorative properties, it proactively addresses and heals various paw pad issues caused by harsh environments. It's more than a balm—it's a true all-in-one paw recovery cream

Keep Paws Protected and Ready for Exploration - Whether it’s playtime in the yard, hiking rugged trails, or hunting in the great outdoors, your pup’s paws take a beating. Our paw butter for dogs deeply hydrates, relieves cracking, and helps heal paw splits. It soothes hotspots, lowers infection risks, restores softness to rough pads, and helps eliminate odors, keeping your pup’s paws fresh and ready for any adventure

Quick Absorption, No Greasy Residue - Powered by small molecule essential oil penetration technology, our paw moisturizer for dogs absorbs quickly into your pup’s paws without leaving any greasy or sticky residue. It’s effective, hassle-free, and keeps your floors clean while providing instant relief and comfort for your pup

Easy to Apply, Mess-Free - Simply twist open and apply directly without ever touching the balm! No tricky caps, no mess on your hands—just easy, clean application every time. Perfect for quick, on-the-go paw care, whether at home or after outdoor adventures. Your pup's paws stay fresh, and your hands stay clean

Year-Round Protection for Your Pup's Paws – From summer's scorching pavement and spring's abrasive terrain to autumn's cracking dryness and winter's biting salt and snow, our paw cream provides essential defense and healing all year. Suitable for all dogs, from small breeds to large, active pups, it ensures that on every brisk walk, rugged hike, or backyard adventure, your pup's paws stay deeply hydrated and comfortably protected

Find the Perfect Size for Your Pup's Needs - Our paw balm comes in three convenient sizes to fit every adventure. Our 0.21oz Travel Stick is compact and portable—standing just as tall as two quarters—making it perfect for quick walks or trips. For daily use, the 0.53oz Standard Jar offers reliable care. For the ultimate value and uninterrupted protection, the 1.06oz Value Jar is your go-to choice, ensuring your pup's paws are always covered

To safeguard your pet's well-being, we advise against using the same balm product for both paws and nose. A pet's paw pads and nasal skin have distinct textures and requirements—our balm is specifically engineered for the tough, abrasive surfaces paws endure, while nasal skin remains more delicate. Using targeted products ensures each sensitive area receives the precise care it needs, provides comprehensive care, and prevents the transfer of outdoor residues to your pet's sensitive nasal area

name: Burt's Bees for Pets Dog Lotion for Paw and Nose with Rosemary and Olive Oil - Soothing Dog Paw Balm Moisturizer for Cracked Pads & Dry Skin, Snout Soother for Dogs, Nose Butter for Dogs, 4 Fl Oz
short_description: DOG SKIN VS. HUMAN SKIN - Dogs' skin has a higher pH, so human grooming products can be harmful. This dog paw and nose moisturizer keeps their skin healthy and without irritation, making it an essential part of your dog bathing supplies.
SOOTHE DRY CRACKED DOG PAWS- This dog moisturizer lotion has naturally derived rosemary and olive oil to help soothe rough dog paws and dry dog noses - a must-have in your dog bathing supplies.
NATURALLY DERIVED INGREDIENTS– Safe & gentle dog spray with 99.7% natural origin formulas, formulated without chemical detergents, phthalates, parabens, or sulfates, as well as colorants and dyes.
KIND TO THE PLANET –Our dog grooming products are packaged in 80% post-consumer recycled bottles.
SKIN-SOOTHING HONEY - Burt’s Bees for Pets products use honey to naturally condition your dog's coat, nourish skin, and maintain the perfect pH balance for pets
NO. 1 NATIONAL BRAND IN PET GROOMING - Join the millions of pet parents worldwide that trust Burt's Bees as the number 1 national brand in pet grooming shampoos & conditioners*
product_description: Since 1984, Burt’s Bees has been working with nature to create products that nourish your skin. With the same mission in mind, we created a custom formulated range of dog grooming formulas to bring the same quality to the lives of our pets. Burt’s Bees™ for Pets™ Dog Paw and Nose Lotion with rosemary and olive oil soothes dry, cracked dog paws and noses. Leveraging the power of naturally derived ingredients, rosemary and olive oil offers superior moisturizing and soothing while honey acts as a conditioner and regulates the delicate pH unique to pets. All our dog grooming products utilize a minimum 95%+ natural origin formulas and are formulated without chemical detergents, phthalates, parabens, or sulfates. Our dog grooming products are also formulated without added colorants and dyes. Burt’s Bees naturally derived pet grooming solutions keep pets clean and pet parents happy! Our dog nose moisturizer is cruelty-free and made in the USA with global ingredients, using 80% post-consumer recycled bottles and responsible sourcing. Directions: Use as needed and gently massage the lotion into the pet's skin to get maximum moisturizing results. *Nielsen Total Pet Plus Stores Pet Grooming Shampoo/Conditioner L52 W/E 10-11-25

name: Bodhi Dog Paw Balm - Lick Safe - USDA Organic Paw Butter - Natural Paw Moisturizer Heals Dry, Cracked Paw Pads - Winter Protection - Pet Paw Balm for Dogs & Cats - Better than Paw Cream, Paw Wax (2oz)
short_description: Paw Balm Dogs Lick Safe: Dried out, cracked & crusty paw pads are uncomfortable for your pet & can make walking painful! Give their pads relief with our paw cream for cracked dog paws. Paws can be tender, raw, crusted & bleed due to rough terrain, dust, allergens, wind, winter snow, ice & salt, extreme hot & cold weather on walks. Our dog paw pad balm glides to relieve cracked, itchy, crusted, red irritated paws, and is a great paw butter for dogs and restores moisture & comfort. Better than paw wax or dog paw cream for rough dog paws.

100% USDA Certified Organic: Our premium dog paw moisturizer is made with shea butter, jojoba oil, beeswax, calendula and rosemary extract and contains no chemicals or fillers found in other dog balm, paw cream, dog lotion, paw wax, or ointment. Safe when licked, our organic paw balm for dogs is an effective dog callus soother, hyperkeratosis cream for dogs, and paw balm for cats.

All-Season Paw Care: Our dog paw pad balm protects against extreme temperatures, relieves rough, scabbed, and raw paws and restores moisture to dry paw pads. Our non-greasy dog paw healing cream absorbs quickly and is an ideal dog foot balm for daily use.

Natural, Gentle & Effective Formula: Our hypoallergenic paw cream for dogs is a perfect choice for pets with sensitive skin or allergies. It is non toxic and alcohol-free and contains no harsh chemicals, parabens, sulfates, dyes, or artificial fragrances. Made from an all plant-based blend our paw softener for dogs provides deep moisturizing. The perfect pet paw balm for puppies, cats, kittens, and adult dogs.

Proudly made in USA: Bodhi Dog is a small family owned business of pet lovers committed to making great products that are safe for you, your pets and the planet! Our premium dog paw protector is cruelty-free and crafted using locally sourced and sustainable ingredients, and eco-friendly packaging. Our dog paw lotion for rough paws works for all breeds and sizes. You will love our natural paw pad moisturizer, made with our ethical family commitment!

name: Palmer's for Pets Cocoa Butter Paw Pad and Nose Balm for Dogs, Fragrance Free Dog Skin Soother with Vitamin E for Dry Paws and Noses, Plant Based Formula, 3.5 Oz
short_description: PAW AND NOSE MOISTURIZER: Designed to help soothe dry, rough paw pads and noses using a rich cocoa butter formula, supporting everyday comfort for dogs exposed to hot pavement, cold surfaces, or dry environments
COCOA BUTTER WITH VITAMIN E: Formulated with cocoa butter and vitamin E to help moisturize and soften dog skin, supporting smoother paw pads and healthier looking noses with regular use
FRAGRANCE FREE FORMULA: Made without added fragrance to support dogs with sensitive skin, offering gentle care for paws, pads, and noses without unnecessary additives
PLANT BASED INGREDIENTS: Crafted with plant based ingredients and made without parabens, phthalates, or gluten, supporting safer daily use as part of routine dog skin care
FOR DRY SKIN AND PADS: Designed to help maintain moisture in dry paw pads and skin, supporting comfort during everyday walks, outdoor play, and seasonal weather changes
MULTI AREA USE: Suitable for use on paw pads and noses, allowing pet owners to address multiple dry areas with one easy to apply balm
TRUSTED PALMERS QUALITY: Backed by Palmer’s experience in skin care, bringing cocoa butter based care solutions to everyday pet grooming routines
product_description: Palmer’s for Pets Cocoa Butter Paw Pad and Nose Balm is designed to help soothe and moisturize dry paw pads and noses as part of everyday dog skin care. The fragrance free formula supports dogs that experience dryness from hot pavement, cold weather, or dry indoor conditions. Formulated with cocoa butter and vitamin E, the balm helps soften rough skin and support moisture retention. These ingredients work together to help maintain smoother paw pads and healthier looking noses when used consistently as part of a regular grooming routine. The plant based formula is made without parabens, phthalates, or gluten and is suitable for dogs with sensitive skin. The gentle composition supports routine use while avoiding unnecessary additives. Designed for multi area use, the balm can be applied to both paw pads and noses, allowing pet owners to address multiple dry areas with one product. Palmer’s for Pets paw and nose balm offers a practical solution for maintaining comfort and moisture through regular care.
